channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2020 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.12. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 20.12 is based on latest .NET version 20.12. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.11. Improvements and Changes Since this monthly release 20.11 Aspose.Page for C++ is available for the Linux platform. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.10. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PAGENET-37 Add support for ReusableStreamDecode. New Feature PAGENET-108 Error while converting EPS to PDF. Bug PAGENET-206 Load PS document produces 1 empty page. Bug You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.9. Improvements and Changes We have improved this month’s release by porting it from the latest code base of Aspose.Page for .NET 20.9. This includes all the enhancements and bug fixes that were part of the .NET version of the API. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.7. Improvements and Changes We have improved this month’s release by porting it from the latest code base of Aspose.Page for .NET 20.7. This includes all the enhancements and bug fixes that were part of the .NET version of the API. Key Summary Category PDFCPP-1301 Fix memory leaks Bug

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.6. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PDFCPP-1296 Memory leaks fix Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes The following public classes, methods and properties have been defined. class Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsModel.XpsContext member Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsModel.XpsContext.Restrict property Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsModel.XpsContext.ActivePage property Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsModel.XpsElement.Parent member Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsModel.XpsObject.AssertObject class Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsPackageParts.FixedDocument class Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsPackageParts.FixedPage property Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsPackageParts.FixedPage.Page class Aspose.Page.XPS.XpsPackageParts.FixedPart

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.4 release. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PDFCPP-1256 Fix error on static initialization Bug PAGENET-102 Memory is not released when converting XPS file to PDF. Bug PAGENET-129 Fix background for PS to Image. Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes Since Aspose.Page for C++ is auto-ported from Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 20.3 This release is based on updates from Aspose.Page for .NET and uses the latest version of shared system code porting library. Based on this information, the following improvements were made in this month’s release. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PAGEJAVA-87 Exception fixed during image to XPS file conversion Bug PDFCPP-1186 Fixed memory leaks that were found during the internal investigation Bug Complete API Reference Guide for Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 20.2 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.Page for C++ has been launched! We are pleased to announce the launch of Aspose.Page for C++ API. It offers a complete set of features to create, read, modify and convert XPS and EPS documents in C++ applications. This first version of the API implements the full functionality of Aspose.Page for .NET which is serving customers for quite a long time now. Using this API, you can develop native C++ applications and deploy them on server or user computers without the need to install any other software applications.
